description: Ministry of Labour Trade Union Relations & Sabaragamuwa Development - Appointed Mr. K. A. T. Karunrathna and 2 others as member of the Wages Boards for the Cinneman Trade for a 3 years period from 1st July 2017 - Appointed  Mr. C. Wanniarachchi & 02 others as members of the Wages Board for the Journalist Trade for 03 years period from  1st August, 2017 - Appointed Mr. C. Subasinghe & 02 others as members of the Wages Board for the March Manufacturing Trade for 3 years period from 01st July 2017
